Name: Baikonur Cosmodrome
World achievements: The first satellite, Sputnik 1, was launched.

Name: Osumi
World achievements: The smallest satellite launch vehicle (L-4S; 9.4t weight, 1.4m diameter)

Name: Sakigake
World achievements: The first interplanetary launch by solid rocket (M-3SII)

Name: Yang Liwei
The firsts in Asia: First man in space launched by an Asian space program

Name: FY-1C
World achievements: Highest in history with altitude 865 km, also the fastest with speed 18k miles

Name: Japanese Experiment Module
The firsts in Asia: Manned foundations in space (STS-123, STS-124, STS-127)
World achievements: The world’s largest pressurized volume in space

Name: Tianlian I
The firsts in Asia:
Indigenous Tracking & Data Relay Satellite System 
First TDRS system to support manned missions

Name: Moon Impact Probe
World achievements: Discovered water on the Moon before impact.

Name: IKAROS
World achievements: The first spacecraft to successfully demonstrate solar-sail technology in interplanetary space

Name: Chang'e 2
The firsts in Asia: Lunar probe with extended deep space missions (asteroid mission to 4179 Toutatis).
World achievements: The first probe to reach Sun-Earth Lagrangian point from the lunar orbit and from there directly to an asteroid. Closest flyby of an asteroid at a distance of only 3.2 km.

Name: Chang'e 3/Yutu
The firsts in Asia: First lunar soft landing and lunar rover.

Name: Mars Orbiter Mission
The firsts in Asia: First successful Mars mission by an Asian country
World achievements: First Martian mission by an individual country to succeed on the first attempt.
